name: Neo Galaxy-Eyes Cipher Dragon
effectText:
3 Level 9 monsters
If this card has a "Cipher" card as Xyz Material, it gains this effect.
‚óèOnce per turn: You can detach up to 3 Xyz Materials from this card; monsters you control cannot attack your opponent directly for the rest of this turn, except this card, also for each Material detached, take control of 1 opponent's face-up monster until the End Phase, but while this effect is applied, they have their effects negated, their ATK's become 4500, also their names become "Neo Galaxy-Eyes Cipher Dragon".
